name: Tier 4 Ranged Fumbles (Levels 13-20)
description: Fumble effects for ranged attacks at Tier 4 (Levels 13-20). Even legends can fail catastrophically.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your shot goes wide but you recover with no additional penalty.
Total Ammo Loss - All your ammunition scatters or is destroyed.
Weapon Damaged - Your bow cracks or crossbow mechanism bends. -2 to attack and damage rolls until repaired.
Severe Self-Injury - You critically wound yourself. Take 3d6 damage and have disadvantage on ranged attacks for 1 minute.
Completely Helpless - You fumble so badly you are incapacitated and prone until the start of your next turn.
Devastating Self-Wound - You severely injure yourself. Take 3d8 damage.
Fatigued - The catastrophic failure utterly exhausts you. You have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks for 1 minute.
Disarmed - Your weapon flies from your hands, landing 30 feet away.
Critically Hit Ally - Your shot critically strikes an ally. Roll attack vs ally's AC; on hit, deal triple weapon damage.
